backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, inquiries, WhatsApp queries, bookings, and shipment tracking with map/list storage and admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a header brand/logo sizing adjustment to its source file and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files including styling, config, components, hooks, and sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global UI element defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container, favicon, metadata, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all site sections with a header, footer, and full-page marketing layout.
frontend/src/components/site/gallery/Gal: Empty placeholder file for a gallery lightbox component.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section outlining company story and core values with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Bo: Renders a full booking form with validation, submission handling, and automatic reset after success.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Provides a contact form with validation, backend submission, and WhatsApp message integration.
Empty section file with no implemented content.
Displays service coverage areas, delivery info, and a nationwide pickup banner using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ga: Empty section file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Shows the homepage hero banner with headline, call-to-action buttons, stats, and a large hero image.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/La: Implements tracking number search, label loading, error states, and print functionality.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Se: Displays a grid of service offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Tr: Renders a shipment tracking UI with a tracking number form and displays status results via useTrackingInfo.
Footer with brand info, quick links, services list, contact details, and social icons.
Responsive header with brand block, desktop/mobile navigation, smooth scrolling, and a Book Now CTA.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabelDetails.ts: Fetches label details for a tracking number using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOneShotTimeout.ts: Runs a one-time delayed callback when a trigger becomes true, with cleanup and stable references.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitBooking.ts: Submits booking data through the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Sends an inquiry to the backend actor and invalidates inquiry queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitWhatsAppQuer: Submits a WhatsApp-related query via the backend actor and invalidates corresponding queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingInfo.ts: Retrieves shipment tracking information for a tracking number using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode, layout utilities, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/validation/booking.ts: Validates booking form fields and returns errors for missing or invalid sender/receiver and package info.
frontend/src/lib/validation/contactInqui: Validates contact inquiry fields for required and wellâ€‘formed name, phone, email, and message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear parameters from URL or storage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates prefilled WhatsApp message text and constructs wa.me URLs with encoded messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, feature tracking, and current project state.
